4.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Lightning damage and gets a !e2% chance to knock the target off-balance.
If the target is under Pain Shock effect, and has been successfully attacked by "Rip"! or "Shred"!, your next Lightning Strike will have a !e3% chance to knock the target off-balance.
4.name: Lightning_Strike
4.title: Lightning Strike

6.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dPet attack.

Pet spends 5 energy to speed up for 4 seconds and attacks the target for X damage.
Has a !e1% chance to cast Open Wound on its target.

If the target is off-balance, pet deals Y damage and has a 100% chance to cast Open Wound on a successful attack.

This effect deals Z damage every 2 seconds.
Lasts for 7 seconds.
6.name: Maul
6.title: Maul

7.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1-!e2 damage and knocks the target off-balance
7.name: Boar's_Blow
7.title: Boar's Blow

8.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases pet's damage by !e1%.
Pet generates !e2% more threat.
Effect lasts for !e3 seconds.
8.name: Great_Hunt
8.title: Great Hunt

9.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals all party members for !e1 over 10 seconds.
9.name: Renew
9.title: Renew

10.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a vortex that inflicts !e1 damage to the target and decreases its movement speed by !e2% for 4 seconds.
If a target has an Open Wound, it has a 100% chance to receive Pain Shock.
Vortex creates Static Charge effect that increases mana cost and damage of your next "Lightning Strike", "Flash Lightning", "Tornado" or "Storm".
Static Charge effect stacks up to !e3 times.
10.name: Vortex
10.title: Vortex

11.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dPet attack.

Pet spends 10 energy to attack the target for X to Z damage.
Silences the target for !e1 seconds.

If the target is under the effect of Pain Shock, pet deals Y to W damage.
11.name: Rip
11.title: Rip

12.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBrews a special potion that appears in the bag and restores !e1% of health and !e2% of mana or energy upon use.
You can only have 5 bottles of Aqua Vitae or "Healing Balm" in your bag.
Ingredients for brewing the potion can be gathered in the Kingdom of Nature.
Warden's trainer will tell you how to get there.
12.name: Aqua_Vitae
12.title: Aqua Vitae

13.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dTreacherous strike that inflicts !e1-!e2 damage to the targetIf the target has Open Wounds it loses !e3 mana
13.name: Hawk's_Strike
13.title: Hawk's Strike

14.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a swarm of bees that inflict !e1 damage over !e2 seconds and disorient the target.
If Open Wounds effect is active on the target, spell duration is increased by 50%.
14.name: Bee_Swarm
14.title: Bee Swarm

15.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBrews a special potion that puts the target to sleep for !e1 seconds, making them unable to move or use abilities.
!e2Any damage will dispel the effect.
Can only be used on targets whose health is at least !e3%.
Cannot be used on undead or mechanical targets.
Only one target can be affected by the Lethargy Potion effect at a time.
Ingredients for brewing the potion can be gathered in the Kingdom of Nature.
Warden's trainer will tell you how to get there.
15.name: Lethargy_Potion
15.title: Lethargy Potion

16.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1-!e2 damage to the target and 5 surrounding enemies in 5 yard radius.
If the target has an Open Wound, all affected enemies receive !e3-!e4 damage.
If a Vulnerable effect is active on the target, all affected enemies receive !e5-!e6 damage.
16.name: Bear's_Blow
16.title: Bear's Blow

17.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a Storm over the chosen location for !e1 seconds.
Continuously inflicts !e2 damage to each of the enemies that enters the storm.
17.name: Storm
17.title: Storm

18.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dRestores 10 energy and 1.
2% mana to all party members every !e1 secondsDispels the Intensive Training effectYou cannot use Natural Force and "Aura of Ferocity" at the same time
18.name: Natural_Force
18.title: Natural Force

19.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCommands your pet to attack the target.
The pet inflicts !e1 damage to the target and !e2 additional targets within a 10 yard radius.
The pet's movement speed is increased for 6 seconds.
*Consumes 15 of your pet's energy.*
19.name: Chomp
19.title: Chomp

20.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBrews Deathly Potion that reduces target's incoming healing by 50% for !e1 seconds.
The effect may be interrupted by the use of three antidotes or three casts of special healing spells.
If the target is affected by Open Wound, it takes five antidotes or five casts of healing spells to remove Deathly Potion effect.
20.name: Aqua_Morte
20.title: Aqua Morte

21.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dA vicious weapon strike that inflicts !e1-!e2 damage.
If a Vulnerable effect is active on the target, your next Clout will inflict 100% additional damageSuccessful "Rip" and "Shred" attacks on a target in a Pain Shock make the target Vulnerable
21.name: Clout
21.title: Clout

22.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBrews a healing balm that restores !e1% of health and !e2% of your mana or energy upon use.
You can only have 5 bottles of "Aqua Vitae" or Healing Balm in your bag.
Ingredients for brewing the potion can be gathered in the Kingdom of Nature.
Warden's trainer will tell you how to get there.
22.name: Healing_Balm
22.title: Healing Balm

23.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 Lightning damage and gets a !e2% chance to knock the target off-balance.
If the target is under Pain Shock effect, and has been successfully attacked by "Rip"! or "Shred"!, your next Flash Lightning will have a !e3% chance to knock the target off-balance.
23.name: Flash_Lightning
23.title: Flash Lightning

24.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dPet attack.

Pet spends 5 energy to speed up for 4 seconds and attacks the target for X damage.
Has a !e1% chance to cast Open Wound on its target.

If the target is off-balance, pet deals Y damage and has a 100% chance to cast Open Wound on a successful attack.

This effect deals Z damage every 2 seconds.
Lasts for 7 seconds.
24.name: Grab!
24.title: Grab!

25.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage to the target and all enemies within a 10 yard radius, then affects the next target in the same way.
Up to 5 targets can be affected.
*Consumes 3 Tears of Dragon.*
Damage dealt by Chain Lightning is increased if Tears of Dragon of a higher quality are used.
25.name: Chain_Lightning
25.title: Chain Lightning

26.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCommands your pet to attack the target.
The pet inflicts !e1 damage every 0.
5 seconds for 2 and stuns the enemy for 0.
5 seconds.
*Consumes 2 Tears of Dragon.*
Duration of the ability is increased if Tears of Dragon of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Rip_up!
26.title: Rip up!

27.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases Agility by !e1%.
Each cast of Pain Shock reduces the cooldown duration of "Bark Shield" by -!e2 seconds.
27.name: Superior_Balance
27.title: Superior Balance

29.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Wisdom and your pet's Finesse by !e1%
29.name: Primal_Inspiration
29.title: Primal Inspiration

30.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dMelee attack that inflicts !e1 to !e2 physical damage, decreases the target's movement speed by 50% and inflicts 1.
09 poison damage every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.
If the target has Open Wounds, Poison damage increases by 100%.
30.name: Snake's_Strike
30.title: Snake's Strike

31.body: !lvl !cost !d"Bark Shield" increases Elemental, Natural and Divine resistance by 35%.
31.name: Shield_of_Nature
31.title: Shield of Nature

32.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dGrants you an Oak Bark effect to increase armor by 35%, but reduces your self-healing spells and potions effectiveness by 50%.
While the effect lasts, your spellcasting cannot be interrupted.
Lasts for 12 seconds.
32.name: Bark_Shield
32.title: Bark Shield

33.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your chance to parry by !e1% of your current chance to parry.
33.name: Blade_Turner
33.title: Blade Turner

34.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases your armor by 30%.
Your weapon attacks increase physical damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effectYou cannot use this spell when your shield is equipped
34.name: Aura_of_Ferocity
34.title: Aura of Ferocity

35.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen Fist Weapons are equipped, "Wolf's Blow" and "Clout" make a combo of two strikes per second.
Casting any other ability will interrupt this combo.
Cooldown time of this ability is !e1 seconds.
35.name: Combo_Strikes
35.title: Combo Strikes

36.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases chance to dodge by !e1% of the current chance to dodge for you and your pet.
36.name: Enhanced_Reflexes
36.title: Enhanced Reflexes

37.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of "Hawk's Strike", "Bear's Blow", "Snake's Strike" and "Tiger's Strike" by !e1% when Fist Weapons are equipped
37.name: Monk's_Way
37.title: Monk's Way

38.body: !lvl !cost !d"Wolf's Blow" and "Clout" inflict !e1% more damage when two-handed weapons are equipped.
38.name: Swing_Up
38.title: Swing Up

39.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen one-handed weapon is equipped, melee abilities damage increases by !e1%.
39.name: Iron_Fist
39.title: Iron Fist

41.body: !lvl !cost !dCooldown between "Hawk's Strike", "Bear's Blow" and "Snake's Strike" decreased by !e1% when two-handed weapons are equipped.
41.name: Pilgrim's_Way
41.title: Pilgrim's Way

42.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHits a target with knuckles inflicting !e1 to !e2 damage.
Has a % chance to inflict Pain Shock, if the target is under Open Wound effect.
42.name: Tiger's_Strike
42.title: Tiger's Strike

44.body: !lvl !cost !dIf the target is under the effect of Open Wound, "Hawk's Strike" will cast Pain Shock on it, and restore !e1 health points for you.
44.name: Energizing_Blows
44.title: Energizing Blows

45.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dIncreases damage by !e1% for 36 seconds but reduces all incoming healing by !e2%.
45.name: Call_for_the_Power
45.title: Call for the Power

46.body:
!lvl !cost !dAs long as Static Charge effect is active, damage dealt by special melee attacks and their mana cost are increased by !e1% per each stack of the effect.
Increases the duration of Static Charge effect by !e2%.
46.name: Charged_Weapon
46.title: Charged Weapon

47.body: !lvl !cost !d"Lightning Strike" and "Flash Lightning" gain a !e1% chance to inflict 20% more damage, and during the last 5 seconds of the "Call for the Power" effect they inflict 50% more damage.
47.name: Power_Explosion
47.title: Power Explosion

48.body: !lvl !cost !dAdditional mana costs caused by Static Charge effect are decreased by !e1%.
48.name: Static_Electricity
48.title: Static Electricity

49.body: !lvl !cost !d"Lightning Strike" and "Flash Lightning" damage increases by !e1%.
49.name: Lightning_Master
49.title: Lightning Master

50.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your and your pet's Endurance by !e1%
50.name: Feral_Instincts
50.title: Feral Instincts

51.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the cooldown duration of "Lightning Strike", "Flash Lightning", "Storm", and "Tornado" by !e1%, and reduces cast time and mana cost of "Vortex" by !e2% when a staff or a spear is equipped
51.name: Channeled_Lightning
51.title: Channeled Lightning

52.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dWhen Potion of Punishment effect lasts, your enemy receives 78.
5 damage per any spell cast within 20 seconds or before 3 attacks take place.
52.name: Potion_of_Punishment
52.title: Potion of Punishment

53.body: !lvl !cost !dCooldown duration of "Aqua Vitae" and "Healing Balm" reduced by !e1%.
53.name: Honey_Wine
53.title: Honey Wine

54.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the duration of the "Lethargy Potion" and Refreshing Potion effects by !e1% and increases the effects of the "Aqua Vitae" effect by !e2%.
54.name: Medley_Mastery
54.title: Medley Mastery

55.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Intelligence and your pet's Strength by !e1%.
55.name: Force_of_Nature
55.title: Force of Nature

56.body: !lvl !cost !d"Renew" spell instantly heals the target for !e1Its effectiveness increases by !e2%.
56.name: Nature's_Touch
56.title: Nature's Touch

58.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a tornado that slows down the target for !e1 seconds and periodically inflicts !e2 Lightning damage.
58.name: Tornado
58.title: Tornado

59.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases duration of "Bark Shield" by !e1% and damage from "Storm" by !e2%.
59.name: Master_of_Nature
59.title: Master of Nature

60.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants your pet a !e1% chance of restoring 15% of its energy and health upon receiving critical damage.
60.name: Survival_Instincts
60.title: Survival Instincts

61.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons !e1 pets that attack the target inflicting 10.
5 to 17.
4 damage per hit.
Pets last for !e2 seconds.
61.name: Call_of_the_Wild
61.title: Call of the Wild

62.body: !lvl !cost !dPet's Stamina increased by !e1%, and its attacks generate !e2% more threat.
62.name: Hard_Training
62.title: Hard Training

63.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen the pet transfers to the Ghostly Plane, you get a !e1% chance to obtain the effect increasing melee damage by 23% for 15 seconds.
63.name: Blood_Shroud
63.title: Blood Shroud

64.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage and duration of Open Wounds by !e1%.
64.name: Severe_Wounds
64.title: Severe Wounds

65.body: !lvl !cost !dAcute Pain deals !e1 damage when the effect fades or when pet's abilities "Rip"! or "Shred"! are used.
65.name: Acute_Pain
65.title: Acute Pain

66.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants your pet's attacks a 25% chance to increase your Luck by 5% for 20 seconds.
There may not be more than !e1 effect active at a time.
66.name: Bestial_Synergy
66.title: Bestial Synergy

67.body: !lvl !cost !dPet's Health and Energy regeneration rates increased by !e1% while in a ghostly form.
67.name: Using
67.title: Using

68.body:
!lvl !cost !dArmor increased by !e1%.
Decreases damage your pet receives from area of effect attacks by !e2%.
68.name: Heightened_Senses
68.title: Heightened Senses

69.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons roots for 20 seconds that slows down all enemies in the area by !e1%.
69.name: Nature's_Grip
69.title: Nature's Grip

70.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCommands your pet to attack the target and inflict !e1 damage.
If the target was under the effect of Pain Shock, !e2 damage is inflicted.
* Consumes 10 of your pet's energy.*
70.name: Shred
70.title: Shred

71.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldowns of all pet's abilities by !e1%.
71.name: Battle_Training
71.title: Battle Training

72.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the duration of the "Great Hunt" effect by !e1%.
72.name: Thrill_of_the_Hunt
72.title: Thrill of the Hunt

74.body: !lvl !cost !dCritical strike damage inflicted by your pet increased by !e1%.
74.name: Innate_Rage
74.title: Innate Rage

77.body: !lvl !cost !dCritical strike damage inflicted by your pet increased by !e1%.
77.name: Thirsty_Werewolf
77.title: Thirsty Werewolf
